bioghist.head: Biographical Information
bioghist.p: Emmanuel Episcopal Church was built in 1843 in the Kempsville, Princess Anne County (now Virginia Beach). David Walke donated the land on which the church was built. It was the first church to be built in Lynnhaven Parish under the Protestant Episcopal Church. The original church was destroyed by fire in 1943. The present church building was consecrated in 1947.

scopecontent.head: Scope and Content
scopecontent.p: Records, 1723-1999, of Emmanuel Episcopal Church in Virginia Beach, including vestry books (20 November 1723-8 December 1959), registers and parish registers (1838-1999), registers of church services (1 March 1967-31 December 1998), financial register (1923-1929), and loose papers such as anniversary booklets, correspondence, deeds, histories, and miscellaneous burials, confirmations, and vestry minutes.

The registers and parish registers, 1838-1999, include includes lists of baptisms, burials, confirmations, communicants, histories, marriages, and rectors. The Parish registers include indexes. The registers of church services include the following information: date/day of service, type of service, place of service, hour of service, number in attendance, communions, officiant/preacher, and memoranda.

arrangement.head: Arrangement
arrangement.p: Organized into the following series: I. Vestry Books, 20 November 1723-8 December 1959; II. Registers and Parish Registers, 1838-1999; III. Registers of Church Services, 1 March 1967-31 December 1998; IV. Financial Register, 1923-1929; V. Loose Papers.

MISC. REEL 4838 contains in this order: Vestry Book, 20 November 1723-16 November 1892; Vestry Book, 28 November 1892-14 August 1947; Vestry Book, 6 March 1951-8 December 1959. MISC. REEL 4839 contains in this order: Register, 1838-1913; Register, 1900-1948; Register, 1929-1936; Register, 1947-1973; Register, 1964-1976; Parish Register, 1973-1976; Parish Register, 1976-1978; Parish Register, 1978-1981; Parish Register, 1981-1983; Parish Register, 1983-1985; Parish Register, 1985-1999. MISC. REEL 4840 contains in this order: Register of Church Services, 1 March 1967-29 May 1977; Register of Church Services, 10 November 1991-31 December 1998; Register of Church Services, 1 June 1977-11 December 1985; Register of Church Services, 15 December 1985-10 November 1991; Financial Register, 1923-1929; Loose Papers.
